attributes.action: Assign adequate parking spaces for people in shared ownership schemes
attributes.additional_details:
As Shared Ownership property owners we aspire to climb the property ladder. We make sacrifices & save enough money to be able to afford a small piece in this expensive world. Yet we are deprived of basic parking facilities while others enjoy 2 to 3 parking spaces on the same estate. How is it fair?

We pay a higher prices, higher rents, service charges and sometimes have homes that are rendered worthless because of careless and inconsiderate developers and politicians.
attributes.background: Ensure that shared ownership buyers are treated fairly and not just treated like statistics. Assign parking to all homes for current and new shared ownership owners.

rejection.details:
Deciding on parking allocations for owners of shared ownership properties is a matter for developers and the relevant local authority, not the Government or House of Commons.

We could accept a petition calling on the Government to require new developments with shared ownership properties to be required to provide parking for shared ownership properties.
